course.title: 秋冬日常美妆
course.headline: 美妆
course.description: 适合新手的美妆教程来啦，可以了解如何护肤，知道如何使妆容服帖。你可以从这个课程中学到很多比如底妆，遮瑕，眼妆眉毛，高光阴影以及口红。本课程适合喜欢橘色系妆容的小姐姐们，适合秋冬很暖心的妆容。妆容适合各个年龄段的女生日常出门。

related.title: Forensic Science
related.headline: Forensic science practice test
related.description: The practice test will help students prepare for OBJECTIVE type questions related to forensic science. The test covers the subjects such as biology, chemistry, physics, questioned documents, fingerprints, medicine and instrumentation. Over 100+ questions to practice.Forensic science is the application of scientific knowledge to legal problems or proceedings. In law enforcement, forensic science is largely concerned with testing physical and biological evidence to determine objective facts about what happened, when it happened, and who was involved.TYPES OF EVIDENCE found in forensic case work are:Controlled substances, latent prints, toxicology and blood alcohol, forensic biology screening, digital evidence, firearms, footprints, fingerprints, tool marks, tire prints, trace evidence, fire debris, explosive evidence, questioned documents etc..

related.title: 德国留学DIY自助向导系列课程
related.headline: 只需8节课的时间，你就能从留学小白变成有方向和目的地自助准备留德达人
related.description: 感谢你来到德国留学DIY自助向导系列课的课程描述。因为我曾经准备德国留学时没有捷径，也不愿意花昂贵的中介费，所以全是自己一手操办，虽然中间问了一些学姐学长的经验，不过在自己准备时才发现很多地方我是需要自己去搜寻和摸索。由于没有经验，当时花了很多时间和经历去搜索学校，查询专业，联系学校，整理材料，而且还绕了不少弯路。因为自己经历过，所以希望帮助和我一样打算到德国留学的后辈们，让你们能不再重蹈我艰辛的覆辙，为你节省时间，让你少走弯路。在经过将近150个小时的材料整理和准备，视频录制和编辑后，我将自己的亲身经历浓缩成8节课分享给你。在课程中，我还会分享自己的心得体会，让你在准备德国留学时能更有方向和针对性，并且在各个考核阶段能一次通过。

related.title: Python深度学习与Tensorflow2实战（2020新版）
related.headline: tensorflow2版本实战
related.description: 课程主要包括两大模块（原理和实战），首先会通俗讲解深度学习中各大经典网络架构并基于tensorflow2版本进行实例演示，详解网络模型训练方法与策略。项目实战全部基于真实数据集与实际任务进行展开，零基础入门深度学习与TF框架并进行进阶提升！

related.title: Photoshop dla każdego
related.headline: Podstawy Photoshopa
related.description: Photoshop to najpopularniejszy program do tworzenia grafiki komputerowej.Korzystają z niego profesjonaliści i amatorzy.Dzięki umiejętności jego obsługi będziesz mógł:tworzyć proste i bardziej zaawansowane projekty graficzne,poprawić wygląd zdjęć,zmienić niepoprawnie ustawiony kadr,stworzyć plakat, broszurę lub wizytówkę,pozbyć się niepożądanych elementów ze zdjęcia.Co otrzymasz dzięki temu kursowi?Musisz przygotować grafikę do wykorzystania w prezentacji firmowej. Byłeś na imprezie firmowej i zdjęcia Członków Zarządu są za ciemne a muszą być powieszone w gablocie w głównym holu. Chcesz wydrukować pamiątkowe zdjęcia z wakacji ale warto by je trochę poprawić (kadr, ostrość, wyrównać). Masz kilkaset zdjęć i chcesz wykonać "na nich" kilka takich samych operacji. Te i wiele innych propozycji czeka na Ciebie w tym kursie.Chcesz zaistnieć w social mediach. Instagram, Facebook i inne Twoje profile rozgrzeją się do czerwoności gdy wrzucisz do nich podrasowane fotki.Już nie będziesz musiał/a się prosić o podretuszowanie zdjęć gdy zmieniając pracę wstawiasz zdjęcie do CV.Do dzieła. Magiczne zdjęcia wymagają Twojej ręki.

related.title: Blindagem de Diamante
related.headline: Banho de Verniz
related.description: Blindagem de diamante está aqui a solução para favorecer unhas fracas e quebradiças ,nessa técnica você profissional aprenderá fazer uma cobertura total sobe as unhas naturais da cliente , alternativa perfeita para as clientes que não gostam de alongamentos mais querem ter suas unhas bonitas, saudáveis e compridas ,a blindagem favorece o crescimento da unha natural sendo assim faz a ação de que elas não lasquem ,trinquem . abram ou rompam processo realizado em 40minutos, temos uma técnica especial de bônus esperando por você... gostou ???? ficou interessada em aprender essa técnica sem necessidade de alongar as unhas das suas clientes????? Então venha agora mesmo e adquira seu curso

related.title: Morgan教你学习量化投资与程序化交易 (EP8:量化择时:打造自己的多空系统)
related.headline: - Quantitative Investing & Algorithm Trading
related.description: 讲者具有15+年以上在研究量化投资与程序化交易方面的经验，使用Multicharts与Trade Station的Easy Language超过12年，信息管理专业出身，也具备中国与台湾多种金融证照，包含证券分析师(CSIA)，对于如何结合IT技术与金融操作，有相当丰富的多年实务经历。过往曾教导许多家教学生，但都没有保存起来教学纪录，觉得有点可惜，因此结合过去多年经验，重新设计了本影音课程，本课程是给对于量化投资有兴趣的人一个入门的基本介绍，并且会教导你如何使用现有平台(Multicharts)，打造属于自己的交易武器与工具。对于初学者、进阶者在学习量化与程序化投资上会遇到的问题，希望都能透过本课程来解决，以及找到正确的方向学习成长。本课程将会分阶段逐步推出，每个系列(EP)下面包含若干子主题，因此可以针对自己想学的主题单独聆听。EP8本EP将把投资绩效的三大核心中，最后一块的择时(Timing Selection)做个说明，并且以范例讲解，要如何打造自己的一个择时系统出来。备注:若学员已经有熟悉或有兴趣的量化平台，本课程也能够提供一个完整量化投资的学习思路，因为所学习的知识与方法，并不一定只局限在使用Multicharts上，本课程的出发点，还是希望能够推广量化投资，讲者自身也涉猎了非常多国内外不同的量化平台与系统，因此虽以Multicharts为例，但背后经验与内容，其实万变不离其宗，都可以套用在其他平台上面。

related.title: 4 Proven Principles For Creating A Life Worth Living
related.headline: A Career Finder Course by Jay Markunas & Angela Loeb
related.description: To make a successful career shift - and, really, to get anything you want in life - you need a good plan, flexibility and strong focus. It also takes persistence and fortitude to stay on task in spite of possible distractions and the “dead ends” or “set backs” which occasionally crop up along the way. Using selected material from the “Go For It!” Module of their popular program, "The Career Finder Method," Jay Markunas and Angela Loëb help you get focused, set goals, keep your momentum and get results. The purpose of this “Career Finder: How to Find the Right Career” course is to give some valuable tips while introducing a few of the concepts for a successful career change. For the more comprehensive course, please check out the complete Career Finder program, which comes with 3 hours of video, a 65-page guide and an online DISC assessment, at www.GreatOccupations.com . Note: This program was originally recorded on June 22, 2010 About the Instructors: Angela Loëb and Jay Markunas have successfully advised professionals on career management and transition strategies for a combined 40 years. Together they inform, inspire and engage audiences with their unique approach of balancing the positive and the practical. ____________________________________________ Feedback from clients about Jay's approach to career transition: “Jay provides a good balance of practical advice and positive encouragement.” – M.G., Austin, TX “You gave me a jump start after I have been bogged down by doubts and insecurities.” – C.L., Austin, TX “Even if you are aware of the wide range of strategies he shares, you’ll come away with more information making it very worthwhile, especially for the short amount of time invested.” – C.S., Austin, TX “I wanted to let you know that I accepted a job with NI last week. I’m excited about the opportunity…. it’s a great role. Thanks for your help.” – J.L., Austin, TX Feedback from clients about Angela's approach to career transition: “Angela provided me with career transition consulting and my only regret was not finding her sooner! From the help re-writing my resume, to the worksheets that helped me to understand my key competencies (very useful for competency-based interviews), to understanding the importance of networking and LinkedIn. Every piece of information and advice Angela gave me was incredibly helpful and definitely got me out of my job search rut. In addition, her upbeat and positive attitude made it an all around pleasant experience working with her. Angela is the ultimate expert at what she does.” Top qualities: Great Results, Expert, High Integrity – Jamelyn Hart, Austin, TX “Angela helped me get a clearer direction in my career path. In our meeting Angela assisted me in narrowing down my fields of interest, suggested some organizations to research, and helped direct me in my action plan. She provided me with several worksheets that were key in revamping my resume. Angela's career coaching has been invaluable to me, and I see a light at the end of the tunnel now thanks to her!” Top qualities: Personable, Expert, Creative – Debbie Lester, Austin, TX Take this Career Finder course now and learn how to find the right career with 4 proven principles.

related.title: Orthopaedics for Medical Students
related.headline: Warrnambool Campus Orthopaedic Course
related.description: This case is primarily intended for Deakin University medical students doing the musculoskeletal block in Year 3 at the South West Healthcare where I work and teach, although it is not directly supported or endorsed by Deakin University.  Much of the teaching will be given as clinical and skills teaching, and the purpose of this part of the course is to provide students with the background to the important conditions that they need to know about but may not see during the rotation.  The course is open for anybody interested, but will be of most interest to medical students in their clinical years undertaking a musculoskeletal/orthopaedic attachment.

related.title: OpenBSD快速入门
related.headline: 关注网络安全? 开始学习OpenBSD吧！
related.description: 担心您的网站或电脑遭受黑客攻击，隐私被盗用？那就试试使用OpenBSD吧！作为黑客大会上最常使用的操作系统，OpenBSD的安全性深受专业人士的认可；同时作为一个很“小众”的操作系统，非安全专业用户会觉得它略显神秘与陌生。在这个课程中我就和大家一起学习OpenBSD操作系统的使用。整个课程历时约3个小时，由12个录屏视频（screencast）组成；通过观看这些视频，你可以了解OpenBSD系统的基本管理与使用，以及如何把它配置成一个“Apache(Nginx)+MySQL+PHP”的WEB平台；如果你在观看视频的过程中有任何疑问，可以在udemy的这个平台上提出(I take questions in English as well)；我每周都会（至少2次， 不定期）到这里来。

related.title: Gephi 中文教程
related.headline: 介绍Gephi的基本使用方法，有大量实际操作的视频演示，便于初学者快速入门。
related.description: Gephi 是一款网络分析领域的数据可视化处理软件，开发者对它寄予的希望是：成为 “数据可视化领域的Photoshop” 。 为推动 Gephi 在中文领域的发展，分享实验室  以MOOC模式在  udemy.com  推出了Gephi中文视频教程。Gephi中文教程介绍了Gephi是什么样的软件，提供什么样的功能，各项主要功能的操作方式等等。  Gephi中文教程采用  CC BY-NC 3.0  版权的协议发布。关于此 Gephi 中文教程如果您有任何问题或建议，可以通过电子邮件（ digitip#gmail.com ）与讲者取得联系，也可以在一些社交网络比如推特微博等查找 @ooof 获取他的更多消息。
